original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2326)@</color> 在武將四周，召喚10隻<color=#4cc769>魍魎石鬼</color>協助作戰。 <color=#4cc769>魍魎石鬼</color>屬性： <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1291)@</color> 武力值：<color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1291)@</color>
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2326)@</color> Around the generals, summon 10 <color=#4cc769>Spirit Stone Ghosts</color>Assist in combat. <color=#4cc769>Spirit Stone Ghost</color> Attribute:  <color=#FFE787>Physical Strength: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1291)@</color>War: <color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1291)@</color>
